title:
Solvable nonlinear systems of 2 recursions displaying interesting
  evolutions
abstract:
In this paper a class of simple, but nonlinear, systems of recursions
involving $2$ dependent variables $x_{j}\left( n\right) $ is identified, such
that the solutions of their initial-values problems -- with arbitrary initial
data $x_{j}\left( 0\right) $ -- may be explicitly obtained.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
